meanings.definition: Resembling an ox in appearance or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The large, strong animal had an oxlike build.
meanings.sent2: The farmer admired the oxlike strength of the plow.
meanings.sent3: The oxlike creature tried to pull the heavy cart but stumbled comically.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as oxlike as the steady plodding of the oxen.
meanings.sent5: The oxlike horns of the statue made it look majestic and powerful.
